Package index

Connector

connect_from_yaml()
Connect datasources to the connections from the yaml content
read_yaml_config()
Read and parse yaml configuration file
connectors()
Special list of connectors
connector
General connector object
cnt_read() cnt_write() cnt_remove() cnt_list_content()
Defaults methods for all connector object
options
connector Options

File System Connector

connector_fs
Connector for file system
cnt_list_content(<connector_fs>)
List content of the directory
cnt_read(<connector_fs>)
Read files for the connector_fs class
cnt_remove(<connector_fs>)
Remove a file or directory
cnt_write(<connector_fs>)
Write a file based on this extension

DBI Connector

connector_dbi
R6 class for a dbi connection, see connector_dbi (used to interact with DBI compliant database backends)
cnt_disconnect() cnt_tbl()
Additional methods DBI connectors
cnt_disconnect(<connector_dbi>)
Disconnect from the database
cnt_list_content(<connector_dbi>)
List tables in the database
cnt_read(<connector_dbi>)
Read a table from the database
cnt_remove(<connector_dbi>)
Remove a table from the database
cnt_tbl(<connector_dbi>)
Create a tbl object
cnt_write(<connector_dbi>)
Write a table to the database

Other stuff

Create a backend
create_backend_dbi()
Create a backend for the DBI (databases)
create_backend_fs()
Create a backend for the file system
error_extension()
Error extension Function to call when no method is found for the extension
example_read_ext()
Example for creating a new method for reading files
find_file()
Find File
get_backend_fct()
Get the backend function
read_ext()
Read a file based on this extension
read_file()
Read files based on the extension
supported_fs()
List of supported files
try_connect()
Create a backend
write_ext()
Write a file based on this extension
write_file()
Write a file based on this extension
